project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file. The program will calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file and load data.
Implement functionality to calculate mean for selected numerical columns.
Implement functionality to calculate median for selected numerical columns.
Implement functionality to calculate mode for selected numerical columns.
Write tests for each of the implemented functions (reading CSV, calculating mean, median, mode).
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
